author: Chaz6
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------

```
$ powershell
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

Application does not crash.

Actual behavior
---------------

```
$ powershell
$XDG_DATA_DIRS is missing. Please run /tmp/.mount_f8fJ9u/usr/bin/pwsh.wrapper from within an AppImage.

Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

https://aka.ms/pscore6-docs
Type 'help' to get help.

PS /tmp> Segmentation fault
```

Backtrace:-

```
[Switching to Thread 0x7fffe9f91700 (LWP 17163)]

#3  0x00007fff2f4eac2d in _nss_dns_gethostbyname4_r () from /tmp/.mount_IHLoIp/usr/lib/libnss_dns.so.2

```

Environment data
----------------

```
$ uname -r
3.10.0-693.11.6.el7.x86_64
$ cat /etc/centos-release
CentOS Linux release 7.4.1708 (Core)
$ rpm -q glibc
glibc-2.17-196.el7_4.2.x86_64
glibc-2.17-196.el7_4.2.i686
```
